title: Evergrowing Fears
description:
As the spirits of Halloween roll in, ever growing fears permeate the air. To cope with it we tell stories to have these fears exorcised. Even in the darkest of times, these tales show us the monsters--even the ones around us. And in these moments together we can distill knowledge needed to help us defeat them. First, Mysterious seeds sow a malevolent growth. And then, a walk along the shore brings unwanted attention. Followed by, a family fights for their lives on the night of Halloween. And finally, we bring you part one of “Jeff the Killer”, our abridged reading of the anonymous creepy pasta.
As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting BetterHelp.com/SCARY
You can get Honey for free today at JoinHoney.com/SS.
Check out the Marvel Television produced Helstrom, all episodes out on Friday, October 16th, only on Hulu 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
